1370: Hugheman was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Reymodis at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Reymodis, Reymodis, at age 25.
1374: Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 5 years old.
1377: Had a son with Reymodis, Splinter, at age 32.
1378: Had a daughter with Reymodis, Ghodelde, at age 33.
Lost daughter Ghodelde when Ghodelde was 1 years old.
1380: Had a son with Reymodis, Bartholomeus, at age 35.
1381: Lost his wife Reymodis while she was giving birth to Ermerut in 1381.
